City Council (Board of Directors)
=================================

114 S Central Street Ferris TX 75125

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/114+S+Central+Street+Ferris+TX+75125)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

114 S Central Street  
Ferris, TX 75125

Phone:

[972-544-2110](tel:9725442110)

Link: [City Council Page](https://www.ferristexas.gov/157)  
  

### Hours

Monday through Thursday  
7:30 am to 5:30 pm

### Contact Us

1. 114 S. Central Street  
   Ferris, TX 75125
2. Phone: [972-544-2110](tel:9725442110)
3. **Municipal Court & Utility Billing**Monday - Thursday 7:30 AM - 5:00 PM  
   **Public Library**Monday - Thursday 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM  
   **All Other Non-Public Safety Departments**Monday - Thursday: 7:30 AM - 5:30 PM

   \*All Non-Public Safety Offices Are Closed Friday through Sunday\*
